actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit mining within any area of the National Park System.

summary.text: Prohibits the exploration for and the mining of and the purchase of all valuable mineral deposits within any area of the National Park System, subject to valid existing rights. Repeals specified laws which permit such mining in conflict with the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit mining within any area of the National Park System.
